Pick_IUserAttributes.Exclude_keyofIUserA.description: From T, pick a set of properties whose keys are in the union K

get.description: List system logs with optional filters and pagination

post.description:
(Optional) Create a system log via API - marked as internal usage; protected by permission
Accepts minimal payload and stores meta as provided.

get.description: Get a single system log by id

Overview statistics (counts + deltas) for a given period.
Defaults to last 30 days when startDate/endDate not provided.

Surveys history / responses timeseries
Query params:
 - startDate, endDate: range (defaults to last 12 months)
 - group: 'daily' | 'weekly' | 'monthly' (default 'monthly')
 - surveyId: optional to filter to a single survey

Returns: { labels: string[], data: number[] } where labels are ISO or human-readable periods
